review_metadata.scope: Sections 6-8 and Appendices A-N of Principia Metaphysica v16.1

critical_findings: Section 6 does NOT reference unity_test_v16.py for falsifiability validation
Section 6 does NOT reference orch_or_geometry_v16_1.py for Orch-OR claims
Section 7 (Conclusion) does NOT mention computed values (alpha=137.036, mass_ratio=1836.15, b3=24)
Appendix G (Wolfram Proofs) does NOT reference formal_proof_indices.json with 35 proofs
Section numbering confusion: Section '8' maps to 'Appendix N' instead of conclusion

section_6_predictions.title: Falsifiable Predictions via the Standard-Model Extension (SME)

unity_test_v16.py.expected: Falsifiability validation showing ONLY b3=24 produces valid physics
unity_test_v16.py.recommendation: Add explicit reference to tests/unity_test_v16.py in Section 6 to demonstrate falsifiability
unity_test_v16.py.proof_summary: Unity test proves b3!=24 causes physics divergence (alpha and mass ratio errors >1%)

topological_uniqueness_lock.py.expected: IP protection proving PM v16.1 is the unique solution
topological_uniqueness_lock.py.recommendation: Strengthen reference to topological uniqueness certification
topological_uniqueness_lock.py.proof_summary: Scans b3 from 1-49 and proves ONLY b3=24 yields valid physics (SHA-256 certified)

orch_or_geometry_v16_1.py.recommendation: Add reference to simulations/v16/quantum_bio/orch_or_geometry_v16_1.py for consciousness claims
orch_or_geometry_v16_1.py.proof_summary: Derives coherence time tau from G2 geometry, validates microtubule pitch = 13 protofilaments

recommendations.message: Add subsection in Section 6 titled 'Falsifiability Validation' that references unity_test_v16.py and shows the divergence plot for b3 != 24
Add subsection in Section 6 titled 'Quantum Consciousness Predictions' that references orch_or_geometry_v16_1.py and validates Orch-OR coherence timescales
Strengthen topological uniqueness claims by explicitly citing topological_uniqueness_lock.py certificate

findings.content_summary: Discusses framework achievements, predictions, falsifiability, future research

b3.description: Third Betti number from Joyce-Karigiannis TCS manifold

recommendations.message: Section 7 MUST include a 'Summary of Key Results' subsection that lists all computed values: alpha^-1 = 137.036, m_p/m_e = 1836.15, b3 = 24, k_gimel = 12.318, C_kaf = 27.2
Add explicit statement: 'These values are derived from first principles and match experimental observations to within 0.1% precision'

section_8_issue.finding: Section ID '8' does not map to 'Conclusion' but instead maps to 'Appendix N'. The actual conclusion is Section '7'.

recommendations.message: Consider renaming Section ID '8' to 'N' for consistency, or create a proper Section 8 for additional content

appendices.title: Wolfram Proofs
appendices.finding: Appendix G mentions Wolfram but does NOT reference formal_proof_indices.json with 35 formal proofs
appendices.full_text: Computer-verified proofs of analytical results using Wolfram Language, including symbolic computations, numerical stability analysis, and precision tests.

recommendations.message: Appendix G (Wolfram Proofs) MUST reference formal_proof_indices.json and explicitly state '35 formal proofs verify all geometric derivations'
Add a table in Appendix G listing key proof categories: GEOMETRIC (7), MASTER_ACTION (5), COSMOLOGY (6), NEUTRINO (8), FERMION (3), QUANTUM (2), GAUGE (4)

key_proofs: alpha_geometric: Fine Structure Constant from G2 = 137.035999
formal_proof_indices_verification.recommendation: Add explicit reference to formal_proof_indices.json in Appendix G with summary table of all 35 proofs

key_findings: Generates divergence plots saved to zenodo_package/05_Verification/
unity_test_v16.py.recommendation: CRITICAL: Add Section 6 subsection referencing this test to prove falsifiability

key_findings: ONLY b3=24 produces valid physics (alpha and mass ratio within 1%)
topological_uniqueness_lock.py.recommendation: Strengthen reference with explicit citation of uniqueness certificate

Computes gravitational self-energy Eg using k_gimel warp factor
Coherence time tau = hbar/Eg falls in neural range (25-500 ms)
Links G2 topology directly to quantum consciousness
orch_or_geometry_v16_1.py.recommendation: CRITICAL: Add Section 6 subsection on quantum consciousness predictions referencing this validation

issues: Section '8' maps to 'Appendix N' instead of a conclusion section
formula_refs in sections 6 and 7 are empty (0 references)

immediate_actions.action: Add subsection '6.X: Falsifiability Validation' that references unity_test_v16.py and includes divergence plot showing b3!=24 breaks physics
Add subsection '6.Y: Quantum Consciousness Predictions' that references orch_or_geometry_v16_1.py and validates Orch-OR coherence timescales
Add 'Summary of Key Results' subsection listing: alpha^-1=137.036, m_p/m_e=1836.15, b3=24, k_gimel=12.318, C_kaf=27.2
Add explicit reference to formal_proof_indices.json with statement: '35 formal Wolfram Language proofs verify all geometric derivations'
Add table summarizing proof categories and key results from formal_proof_indices.json

validation_summary.overall_assessment: Paper is schema-compliant but MISSING critical references to verification files (unity_test, orch_or, formal_proof_indices). Academic armor exists in codebase but is NOT integrated into paper sections. Immediate action required to inject these references into Sections 6, 7, and Appendix G.
